register.heading: Sign Up
register.usernameInvalidCharactersValidationError: Username may only contain letters, numbers, and hyphens
register.emailValidationError: Please enter a valid email address
register.passwordMinLengthValidationError: Password must be at least 8 characters
register.passwordWeaknessError: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number
register.serverErrorMessage: An error occurred. Please check your information or try again later
register.successAlertDescription: We've sent a verification link to your email address. If you don't see it, please check your spam folder

verify.heading: Account Verification
verify.successMessage: Your account has been successfully verified
verify.errorMessageDescription: The verification link may be invalid or expired. Please try again or contact support

login.heading: Sign In
login.pinDescription: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
login.totpValidationErrorDescription: Please check your code and try again
login.credentialsValidatonErrorDescription: Please check your credentials and try again
login.serverErrorMessage: An error occurred while signing in. Please try again later

resetPassword.heading: Password Recovery
resetPassword.emailValidationError: Please enter a valid email address
resetPassword.emailFieldDescription: Enter the email associated with your account
resetPassword.successAlertDescription: We've sent a password reset link to your email address. If you have Telegram notifications enabled, you'll also receive the link there
resetPassword.errorMessageDescription: Please check your email address or try again later

newPassword.heading: Create New Password
newPassword.errorMessageDescription: The reset link may have expired. Please request a new password reset
newPassword.passwordMinLengthValidationError: Password must be at least 8 characters
newPassword.passwordWeaknessError: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number
